articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Johnson & Johnson strikes deal with U.S. government to lower drug prices - CNBC
articles.description: Johnson & Johnson said on Thursday that it has reached an agreement with the U.S. President's administration to cut drug prices for Americans.
articles.content: Johnson & Johnson said on Thursday that it has reached an agreement with U.S. President Donald Trump's administration to cut drug prices for Americans in exchange for exemptions from U.S. tariffs… [+1527 chars]

articles.title: Greenlanders express fear and indignation as Trump eyes territory - BBC
articles.description: Greenlanders tell the BBC they have no interest in becoming American as the White House restates its desire for annexation.
articles.content:
Alicia Curry,in London,and
Adrienne Murray,in Copenhagen
Mia Chemnitz says "the people of Greenland do not want to become American"
